name: Senior React Native developer, New Zealand
description:
RELOCATION!

Оформляем рабочую ВИЗУ, через 5 лет можете оформлять гражданство!

Ideally, we are looking for someone who has:

  • fluent English (both written and verbal form)
  • 7+ years in a development role
  • Applicable qualification in software development or computer science
  • Solid experience in mobile development, being familiar with publishing apps to Android and iOS stores (React Native)
  • Solid experience in NativeScript with Javascript, Typescript
  • Solid experience in REST API development
  • Some experience with Java 8 or higher, with Spring/Spring-boot a plus
  • Some experience with SQL, with PostgreSQL a plus
  • Solid experience with version control (Git) and code repository/release management
  • Experience in DevOps technologies like Azure, AWS and Docker a plus
  • Pet projects you can present are also a plus to show your passion

Why should you join us?

  • We provide work visa
  • We greatly value good work life balance, which is why we provide flexible work arrangements, and working overtime is the exception, not the rule
  • We live a flat team structure, the directors work alongside you and are happy to have a chat any time
  • Our processes are lean and agile, you won’t have to cut through lots of red tape to get things done
  • Our company favors projects that directly improve peoples lives. Simply put, you'll be able to work on stuff that matters, and that you'll be proud to tell your family and friends about
  • You’ll have awesome co-workers work alongside and share knowledge with you, with deep experience and expertise and quite a few PhDs in the mix
  • We will actively support your up skilling and career growth
  • We offer competitive remuneration packages
